text: @WhiteHouse @SecretaryCarson "Just finished a very good conversation with President Xi of China.Discussed in great detail the CoronaVirus that is ravaging large parts of our Planet.China has been through much & has developed a strong understanding of the Virus. We are working closely together. Much respect!"
